alert.note: Alert for Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 4:43PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY... SOUTHERN SAN JACINTO...NORTHWESTERN CHAMBERS...SOUTHWESTERN LIBERTY AND NORTHEASTERN HARRIS COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM CDT... At 443 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodbranch, or near Kingwood, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Pasadena, Humble, Galena Park, Jacinto City, northern Liberty, Dayton, Cloverleaf, Kingwood, Greater Greenspoint, Spring, Highlands, Barrett, Aldine, Channelview, northern Northside / Northline, The Woodlands, Crosby, Oak Ridge North, Shenandoah, and Splendora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty
